titleInfo.title: Letter from William Merewether, On the Indus to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding Merewether's meeting with the Governor of Bombay (Sir George Clerk), which Henry Green accompanied him on, and his disappointment that the Governor was not able to see the Sind military first hand as well as discussing his negotiations with the Governor and the Council in Chief over proposed reductions to the Sind Irregular Horse.The letter also refers to the Governor's response to Pelly's letter on the situation with Mahomed Ameer Khan [Mohammad Amir Khan] in Kandahar; and the timing of the introduction of Lord Canning's inheritance proclamation.
